thread.title: 11 Musicians Who Surprisingly Haven’t Won a Grammy (PHOTOS)
thread.title_full: 11 Musicians Who Surprisingly Haven’t Won a Grammy (PHOTOS)

author: Dan Clarendon
title: 11 Musicians Who Surprisingly Haven’t Won a Grammy (PHOTOS)

organizations.name: national academy of record arts and sciences

text:
1. Nicki Minaj Advertisement 
She may be Your Minajesty, but this 34-year-old doesn’t have any Grammy gold in her crown, despite 10 nominations in years past. She was just nominated three more times, however, so have hope! 2. Katy Perry 2. Katy Perry Advertisement 
The Academy has been “Hot n Cold” with this 32-year-old pop star, granting her 13 nominations but 0 wins. Oft-cited rival Taylor Swift, however, has earned 29 nominations and 10 wins. That must sting! 3. Nas 3. Nas Advertisement 
Despite racking up 11 Grammy nominations and being ranked as the fifth greatest MC and the second-best lyricist of all time , this 43-year-old Illmatic rapper has yet to take home the big prize. 4. Journey 4. Journey Advertisement 
We wish we could tell you “Don’t Stop Believin’”... but it might be time to stop believing. Despite huge success over the past four decades, this rock band has only earned one nomination (for a 1996 song we’ve never heard of)! 5. J. Cole 5. J. Cole Advertisement 
This 32-year-old’s third studio album, 2014 Forest Hills Drive , was the first rap album in over 25 years to go platinum without any guest appearances or features. It also got him three out of the five Grammy nominations he has received so far, but he lost each of those five times. 6. Kiss 6. Kiss Advertisement 
The Academy might have something against facepaint and freaky tongues, as this hard rock band has only nabbed one nomination, for 1999’s “Psycho Circus.” (We still wanna “Rock and Roll All Nite,” though.) 7. Martina McBride 7. Martina McBride Advertisement 
Always a bridesmaid, never a McBride? This 50-year-old has been named the CMA Female Vocalist of the Year four times, but none of her 14 Grammy nominations has resulted in a win. 8. Future 8. Future Advertisement 
This Atlanta-based rapper, 32, is approaching the million sales mark between his four studio albums. However, his one and only Grammy nomination came this year — and not even for his album but for his featured role on Drake’s Views . 9. Bjork 9. Bjork Advertisement 
No one else on this list has been so groundbreaking as to earn a Museum of Modern Art retrospective, but this Icelandic 51-year-old still doesn’t have a Grammy, despite 14 nominations so far. 10. Brian McKnight 10. Brian McKnight Advertisement 
This 47-year-old R&B star boasts 12 studio albums, 3 of which achieved Platinum status, but still has no Grammy. His 16 unrecognized nominations ties him with… 11. Snoop Dogg 11. Snoop Dogg Advertisement 
The Academy has kept this ever-popular 45-year-old rapper in the Dogg-house, nominating him 17 times in the past 23 years, with nary a trophy to call his own. NEXT Advertisement 
When the National Academy of Record Arts and Sciences makes a lot of people very happy this weekend with the 2017 Grammys , the musicians and bands in the slideshow above can’t be blamed if they feel a little bitter. 
Click through the photos to see 11 big names in the music world that are never preceded with the phrase “Grammy winner.”
